page.title: 08EAST MEON - FACILITIES
page.content: Facilities available in East Meon include 2 pubs - The Isaak Walton & The George;the Spar (a grocery shop & general store);the Post Office;a video hire shop;a garage and filling station;a house offering 'Bed & Breakfast';a dairy shop; a Village Hall, which is used by the Church and can also be hired by the public for meetings, parties and other entertainment, and a Primary School. On the southern edge of the village is a forge which is situated near to the playing fields, and has been in existence for a long time. A forge caters only for the making and general repair of iron and steel articles, whereas a blacksmith shoes horses.The forge is run by 2 youngish men who make a living by repairing and making items such as wrought iron gates.
